Sat., Sept. 23: Join us for brunch, mimosas, and a gathering of like-minded civil libertarians.
  


Bill of Rights Brunch

Saturday, Sept. 23, 10 a.m.
Greater Des Moines

Dear ##first_name[ACLU Supporter]##,

Just two more weeks until our annual Bill of Rights Brunch! Please join us on Saturday, September 23 as we review a year that has been one for the history books and outline our plans to continue the fight for civil liberties in our state and our country. So much is at stake.

Bill of Rights Brunch
Saturday, September 23, 10 a.m. - 12:30 p.m.
Greater Des Moines Botanical Center
909 Robert D. Ray Drive
Des Moines, Iowa 50309
RSVP

Enjoy brunch, mimosas, a bloody mary bar, and the beautiful Greater Des Moines Botanical Garden. We will also take this opportunity to honor and highlight the work of those who have made notable contributions to civil liberties in Iowa, including:

  • The Rev. Anna Blaedel and the Organizers of the Women's March
  • Joy Corning (posthumous) and Mary Campos
  • Glen Downey
  • J.J. Kapur
  • Planned Parenthood of the Heartland

RSVP today! All attendees receive complimentary admission to the full gardens during our event.

We hope to see you there!

Sincerely,


Mark Stringer
Executive Director
ACLU of Iowa
